statusDetails.message: TypeError: response_has_field_value() takes 2 positional arguments but 3 were given

steps.name:
Send GET request by authorized user to url:
 https://gorest.co.in/public-api/users/2001
Check response has one of (200,) status code
Check response jsondata have code field with 200 value
Check response jsondata have all of ('data',) fields

labels.name: story
labels.value: Authorized user can see users information
